Name: Fists
Ability Box: This item can be used as a OneHanded Weapon, with the following modifiers: -1 d10.

Name: Sail Spolas
Flavor: Shields little more than dignity.
Ability Box: +1 Courage. Fate Discard Second Chance.

Name: Shipwrecker Shield
Flavor: Wreck and rule!
Ability Box: Crit Evade: Place 2 Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Siren Panoply Armor
Flavor: Carved from several AE-siren shells.
Ability Box: Fate Reinforce 1.

Name: Siren Shield
Flavor: Broken shells make sharp teeth.
Ability Box: Opening 1. Reposition 2.

Name: Boatmace
Flavor: Rock the boat.
Ability Box: Break 1.

Name: Kratos Kopis
Flavor: To the dead gods do we raise our prayers.
Ability Box: Carving 1. Sacrifice.

Name: Naval Ram
Flavor: Full speed ahead
Ability Box: Auto-break 2. Break 2. Power Re-roll 1. Cumbersome. Full Miss: Place 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Heavy Kopis
Flavor: Olympians may be gone, but their memory lingers
Ability Box: Carving 1. Opening 1. Sacrifice. Danger 2+ When you are about to perform a Power Roll, gain +3 Danger to gain +1 RedPowerDie for this Attack.

Name: Jawbone Axe
Flavor: Made from the jaw of a giant speckled shark
Ability Box: Deadly. Danger 6+ Auto-break 1.

Name: Ballista Gun
Flavor: This naval siege weapon got a new lease on life.
Ability Box: Ranged 4-6. Cumbersome. Commit.

Name: Petrified Javelin
Flavor: Eschaton has unearthed the undersea forests.
Ability Box: Ranged 2-4. Cumbersome.

Name: Liontail Whip
Flavor: Long-tailed lions will soon go extinct
Ability Box: Reach 2. Full Hit: You may gain the PriorityTarget token. Danger 6+ Spotlight.

Name: Whalebone Bident
Flavor: Make a wish.
Ability Box: Reach 2. Full Miss: Place 1 Opening token in the Kratos Pool. Danger 5+ Diversion.

Name: Longmast Spear
Flavor: It bears the mark of Rhodes. But we did not sail there...
Ability Box: Reach 2. Reposition 1. Danger 5+ Opening 2.

Name: Iapetus Lifeguard
Flavor: One small step makes all the difference.
Ability Box: Reaction Fate Exhaust Reflex.

Name: Spring Harness
Flavor: To stand when others would fall.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Stand up. You can use this ability while knocked down.

Name: Smelted Breastplate
Flavor: Noble deeds reforged to serve a higher purpose.
Ability Box: Tumble. Fate Reinforce 1. Fate Discard Second Chance. Danger 8+ Reinforce 2 instead.

Name: Smelted Aspis
Flavor: You will not be forgotten.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Block 1. Reaction Fate Exhaust Reflex. Full Evade: You may immediately resolve Knockback 2 against the Primordial. Danger 5+ Crit Evade: Place 2 Break or Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Smelted Xiphos
Flavor: Legacy remelted.
Ability Box: Power Re-roll 1.Danger 6+ Power Re-roll 2 instead.

Name: Impetus Breakers
Flavor: Deadstop.
Ability Box: Fate Knockback Reduction 3.
Ability Box Literal: Fate You may reduce suffered Knockbacks by 1.

Name: Analyticos Module
Flavor: It's over 9000...
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Place 1 Break or 1 Opening token in the Kratos Pool. Danger 6+ Fate Exhaust Place 2 Break or 2 Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Primordial Lure
Flavor: A perfect moment is all it takes.
Ability Box: Unique. Fate Energy Place the top BP card at the bottom of the deck.

Name: Hekaton Panoply Armor
Flavor: Weighted with stone slabs, lifted by the Centimanes' legacy.
Ability Box: Knockback Reduction 2. Fate Reinforce 1. Crit Evade: Gain Rocksteady until you finish resolving this Attack. Danger 9+ Rocksteady.
Ability Box Literal: You may reduce suffered Knockbacks by up to 2. Fate Reinforce 1. Crit Evade: Gain Rocksteady until you finish resolving this AI card. Danger 9+ Rocksteady.

Name: Knuckle Shield
Flavor: How you really feel
Ability Box: Knockback Reduction 1. Fate Wound: BP Suppress. Fate Fate Exhaust Block 1. Danger 6+ Crit Evade: Gain Stalwart until the end of this Attack.
Ability Box Literal: You may reduce suffered Knockbacks by 1. Fate Wound: BP Suppress. Fate Fate Exhaust Block 1. Danger 6+ Crit Evade: Gain Stalwart until the end of this AI card.

Name: Pillarmace
Flavor: These columns were consecrated in the names of the Olympians.
Ability Box: Break 1. Full Hit: Diversion. Full Miss: Place 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Hekatomb
Flavor: Watch your fingers.
Ability Box: Break 1. Carving 1. Deadly.

Name: Rebound Hammer
Flavor: Use your head.
Ability Box: Auto-break 1. Power Re-roll 1. Pushback 1. Cumbersome. Full Miss: Place 2 Opening or 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Gigan
Flavor: Stones to cut stones, what beautiful symmetry.
Ability Box: Unique. -1 Speed. Auto-break 1. Pushback 1. Cumbersome. Full Miss: Place 2 Opening or 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Sail Camo
Flavor: Cloak of Nyx it is not, but it will do.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Start of Battle: Move up to 3 spaces and Hide. Fate Exhaust Hide. Danger 6+ Discard Dodge.

Name: Tackle Sheath
Flavor: Better take a spare than be left with none.
Ability Box: Start of Battle: Choose 1 OneHanded Gear from the Argo Armory and place it under this card. This Gear is not considered to be equipped on your Titan and can only be used with the following ability: Fate Exhaust Declare this OneHanded Gear as the Active Weapon during an Attack. Danger 8+ Ignore this card ability's Fate cost.

Name: Aeolipile Engine
Flavor: Spirit of Hermes, grant me this small favor.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Gain +2 Speed for your next MovementAction this turn. Fate Exhaust Stand up. You can use this ability while knocked down. Danger 6+ Gain +3 Speed instead.

Name: Stabilizers
Flavor: In the image of the Wolf Hunters of Apollo Lykaios.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust During voluntary movement, treat a traversible Terrain tile as 1 space. Reaction Fate Fate Exhaust Reflex. Danger 7+ You may use Stabilizers' ability as Reaction

Name: Grappling Hook
Flavor: Even the tallest mountain can be climbed.
Ability Box: Fate Fate Discard During an Attack, when you reveal a BP card with a Critical that creates a Vantage Point, immediately gain a Crit Chance.

Name: Safety Rope
Flavor: Even the deepest chasm can be crossed.
Ability Box: Fate Discard Lifeline.

Name: Instinct Linothorax
Flavor: Light, but sturdy.
Ability Box: Tumble. Vault. Danger 8+ Stalwart

Name: Bull Aspis
Flavor: This will make them angry.
Ability Box: Diversion. Crit Evade: Place 1 Diversion token in the Kratos Pool. Danger 5+ Tumble.

Name: Maze Rake
Flavor: This is how they led the prisoners to the Labyrinth.
Ability Box: Reach 2. Pull 1. Reposition 1. During an Attack, ignore Labyrinth tiles for the purposes of Line of Sight and adjacency. Danger 5+ Opening 2.

Name: Whaler Javelin
Flavor: Come over here!
Ability Box: Ranged 2-4. Pull 1. Cumbersome. Commit. Danger 5+ Break 2.

Name: Hullbow
Flavor: Let it rip!
Ability Box: Ranged 3-5. Diversion. Cumbersome. Commit. Danger 5+ Opening 1. Break 1.

Name: Ariadne's Hello
Flavor: You only get one chance to make a first impression.
Ability Box: Unique. Reach 2. Provoke. Commit. Full Hit: Diversion.

Name: Gigas
Flavor: Chief among them was Gigas, the Left Hand of Gaia.
Ability Box: Unique. -1 Speed. Auto-break 1. Pushback 2. Reach 2. Cumbersome. Commit. Full Miss: Place 2 Break or Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool.

Name: Mazemmer
Flavor: It is better to be the hammer than the anvil.
Ability Box: Unique. Crit Miss: Gain +2 Danger. Ignore Wound Responses. Fate Wound: BP Suppress.

Name: Ariadne's Goodbye
Flavor: I don't like long goodbyes.
Ability Box: Unique. Reach 2. Deadly. Provoke. Commit. Full Hit: Diversion

Name: Morpheus Module
Flavor: A sleepless sleep to calm the restless.
Ability Box: +1 Will. Fate Exhaust Ignore the effects of Despair, Fear or Dread until the end of your turn. Fate Discard Solace. Danger 7+ You may use Morpheus Module's Solace ability as Reaction.

Name: Faceshield
Asterisk Effect: *X is equal to the number of Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool.
Ability Box: Fate Exhaust Block 1. Ascended. Break 1. Daze. Kickback Reduction 1. Danger 7+ Ignore Exhaust cost of Block 1.

Name: The Promise
Ability Box: Unique. Overbreak 2. Crit Miss: Gain +1 Danger, +1 Fate. Dog Days Are Over: When you deal a Critical Wound, lose -1 Strangers. Danger 7+ Overbreak 2.

Name: Slushbane (Wished)
Flavor: The Great Alkahest of the Atlantean nation was to be their undoing.
Ability Box: Wished. Unique. Black 2. Burden 1. Elation 1. Succor. Unholy Alchemy. Ambrosia Limit 3. Ignore the Curse Carapace Trait. Ambrosia 1+ One RedPowerDie becomes a BlackPowerDie. Ambrosia 2+ Reach 2. Ambrosia 3+ Another RedPowerDie becomes a BlackPowerDie. Elation 1. Danger 6+ Hope 1.

Name: MWE-4 "Keelbow"
Flavor: An elegant weapon, for a more civilized time...
Ability Box: Ranged 3-4. Cumbersome. Daze. CombatAction Take Aim: Place an Opening token on this card. For each Opening on this card gain +3 Precision. When you attack discard all Opening tokens from this card. Danger 3+ Loses Cumbersome.

Name: MWE-33U "Gardeners"
Flavor: To climb the spires of smog
Ability Box: Reposition 1. Opening 2. Each Hit: Gain +1 PowerIcon. Crit Chance: Gain +1 PowerIcon.

Name: MWE-33B "Chainblade"
Flavor: It embodies the vow of the Argo.
Ability Box: Ranged 2-3. When you hit, Pull the Primordial until it is adjacent to you. Moving outside your effective range doesn't cause a Chain Break. Danger 3+ Overbreak 2.

Name: MWE-6D "Sharkscourge"
Flavor: One of the legacy weapons from Ur-Ithaka.
Ability Box: Reach 2. Commit. Exhaust Wound: Place a negative Speed modifier token on the Primordial Sheet. When you unexhaust this card, discard that token.
